/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The road itself is divided by a median, and there are trees lining both sides, adding a touch of green to the urban landscape. In the distance, buildings can be seen, indicating the presence of a cityscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the green of the trees and the various colors of the buildings.
